basics.name: Caleb Cheshire
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2022.

work.summary: Cared for the landscaping and maintenance of the campus
highlights: Operated equipment and machinery to maintain an impeccable landscaping appearance
Led small teams to perform skilled tasks or labor
Officiated youth soccer matches, ensuring the safety of the teams and spectators
Managed safety concerns, laws of the game, security of the pitch, and decorum of onlookers
Lead cadets and develop them as future leaders for the United States
Inspire a new generation of aerospace pioneers and professionals
General Military Course Advisor, AS200 Class, Spring 2020
Cadet Wing Physical Fitness Officer, August 2020-Present

awards.title: Achievement Award
awards.awarder: Air Force ROTC, Detachment 175, UH Manoa
awards.summary: For outstanding performance as a General Military Course cadet. Awarded to no more than the top 25% of the Cadet Wing.

awards.title: Air Force ROTC Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and current cadets who demonstrate academic, military, and personal excellence.

awards.title: Meritorious Service Medal
awards.summary: Led a staff of 50 cadets to provide a basic training course to approximately 100 cadets from across the United States. See portfolio projects for additional details.
